Title: Requires the pre-payment of sales and compensating use tax on sales of beer intended for off premises consumption
Summary: Requires the prepayment of sales and compensating use tax on sales of beer intended for off premises consumption.
LawCode: Amd Tax L, generally; amd §§1.20 & 2.10, CP L; add §53-b, ABC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the criminal procedure law and the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to requiring the pre-payment of sales and compensating use tax on sales of beer intended for off premises consumption
